transcript: be a battalion of us aides- de-camp and adjutants! But this is what we'll do: I have a good friend, an adjutant general and an excellent fellow, Prince Dolgorukov; and though you may not know it, the fact is that now Kutiizov with his staff and all of us count for nothing. Everything is now centered round the Emperor. So we will go to Dolgoru- kov; I have to go there anyhow and I have al- ready spoken to him about you.
